description: Current message for the NotImplemented result from nova-api is the standard server error message. It could have a clearer message.
title: Return a better error message for NotImplemented

comments.content: Current message for the NotImplemented result from nova-api is the standard server error message. It could have a clearer message.

comments.content: I commented in the review that this is probably best just dealt with as a webob bug

comments.content: Soren agreed with me and there's been no update since. Closing
